rows.label: qev070201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh, THERE you are! I've been looking for for you
pretty much forever, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0002
rows.name:
Anyway, Professor B sent us a message!
...Er, from the future?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0003
rows.name:
It sounds like he needs help, but but I don't think there's
a whole lot I can do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0004
rows.name:
This is one of his inventions—it lets you directly
communicate with the the specified target's brain.
Are you with me so far?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0005
rows.name:
I was most surprised when it suddenly materialized on
top of my desk one day, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0006
rows.name:
Anyway, maybe it's faster if I just show you?
I'll play it it back again...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0007
rows.name:
...This sucker on? All right. This message is encoded so
only Veven and [ST:playername ] can view it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0008
rows.name:
So don't either of you knuckleheads go telling anyone
else what you hear! I've still got people after me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0009
rows.name:
Anyway, I'll get to the point—I'm on Great Washington
Isle over in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0010
rows.name:
I need some help here with...
Well, you'll see when you get here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0011
rows.name:
And hurry it up! I need to get back to the city and
get to the bottom of this anomaly affecting Mira![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0012
rows.name:
It seems the space Mira occupies is something even
more troubling than we'd thought. It—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0013
rows.name: Wup, wup?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0014
rows.name:
Ah! Here comes my prey. Anyway, that's the story.
I'll see you here soon. DON'T BE LATE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0015
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0016
rows.name: Did you get all that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev070201_SEL0031
rows.name: Nod and say that you heard everything.

rows.label: qev070201_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev070201_SEL0041
rows.name: Lie and say that you did not catch any of it.

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0017
rows.name:
Oh, good. So like I said, the spot the professor
mentioned isn't really somewhere I can can get to,
you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0018
rows.name:
What? Really? But but I heard it loud and clear...
That's so strange, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0019
rows.name:
Ah, well. I'll give you the short version, if that's okay?
Professor B is on Great Washington Isle in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0035
rows.name:
He's in some kind of trouble there, however,
and is pretty much asking us for for help?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0036
rows.name:
But I'm not exactly the rugged type, you know?
I can't really get to where he he is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0020
rows.name:
So I was hoping you could help him out instead?
I'm sure you've got a ton of questions for him, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0021
rows.name: Like what he's doing back in our time, for starters?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0022
rows.name: Thank you. Oh, and good luck and all that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0023
rows.name:
While you're gone, I'll dust off his lab so we're ready
to get cracking once he comes back, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0024
rows.name: I didn't think we'd see him again so soon...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0025
rows.name:
It's almost a little anticlimactic, don't you think?
But that's the professor for you, I guess...
One surprise after the the next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0026
rows.name:
So did something happen with Professor B?
Ever since he returned, he's been kind of...vacant?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0027
rows.name: Maybe he ate something funny out in in Oblivia?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0028
rows.name:
Professor B said I had some important science to do.
He even told me I'd be living in the lab for the
foreseeable future...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0029
rows.name:
He's like a man possessed right now, you know?
Says he doesn't expect to sleep for the the next week
or two...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070201_MSG0030
rows.name:
I'd say that things are finally getting interesting around
here again, aren't they?[ST:wait ]
